People.problem: Team members disagree on project timelines.

Product.problem: New features don’t meet customer needs.

steps.name: Triage
steps.description: Prioritize problems based on urgency and impact.
questions: Is there an immediate action I need to take to reduce the impact of the problem?
Is there a reasonable degree of likelihood I can solve this problem?
If I can solve the problem, can I solve it in a timely manner?
If I can solve the problem, will it make a significant difference?

steps.name: Analyze
steps.description: Understand the root cause(s) of the problem.

steps.name: Plan
steps.description: Determine how to resolve the identified root causes.

steps.name: Implement
steps.description: Put the solution in place and monitor its effectiveness.
considerations: Allow time for sufficient data collection

steps.name: Evaluate
steps.description: Assess the outcomes against expectations and refine as necessary.
actions: Determine if the solution improved the situation
Revisit Analyze if outcomes don’t match expectations
